/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, constructed of brick, exhibit a traditional Chinese architectural style, adding a touch of historical charm to the scene. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the urban environment. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
